summary: The AltDiffusionImg2ImgPipeline class provides a comprehensive pipeline for generating images based on textual prompts and an input image using the Alt Diffusion model. It handles loading and preprocessing of inputs, encoding prompts, preparing latents, running the diffusion process with guidance, decoding the output, and performing safety checks.
business_intent: This pipeline enables developers to create applications that can transform existing images according to user-provided text descriptions, facilitating creative content generation, image editing, and visual prototyping.
